participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and adventurous, loves nature and the arts.
participant_1.background: I would like to work for the Smithsonian. My parents are lawyers. I once swam with manta rays. I hate winter and the cold.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and creative, enjoys sharing knowledge and experiences.
participant_2.background: My favorite brand of clothing is Donna Karan. I sing in the church choir every Sunday. I love to read the Bible before I go to bed. I love to go to the symphony orchestra. I am a middle school teacher for 8th grade.

content.text: I love the Smithosonian! I've always wanted to work there.
I've heard it's a great place to work. What do you want to do there?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about working in the natural history museum.
That would be so cool! I love learning about animals.
Me too! I think it would be so amazing to be able to work with them every day.
I bet it would be. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to swim. I once swam with manta rays!
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go swimming with manta rays.
It was incredible! They're so beautiful and graceful.
I bet they are! I love going swimming, but I'm not sure I'm brave enough to swim with manta rays.
It's definitely not for everyone, but it was an experience I'll never forget.
I'm sure it was! What else do you like to do?
I love reading and writing. I'm also a big fan of the arts.
Me too! I love going to the symphony and the opera.
I love the symphony too! I've been going since I was a little kid.
It's so relaxing and beautiful. I love listening to the music and watching the orchestra perform.
Me too! It's one of my favorite things to do.
